Hi...I'd like someone to give me a hand if possible please.  I'm still new to downloading movies, getting it right most times however when a movie such as this comes with a .srt file, I'm unable to open it.  What I mean is that the movie plays on my Windows Media Player but without subs.  I use WMP to burn all my movies, it works fine for me but I desperately want to watch this movie but can't get the subs to work.  They work fine if I watch it in VLC however I can't burn DVD's using VLC.  Any advice please would be greatly appreciated.  Thank you...
just drag the srt file over vlc after starting the movie. hest.

Thank you, BONE, for a fine upload. I haven't watched a good Thai movie since Bang Rajan!!
Well, I watched all of Tony Jaa movies and Chocolate and Raging Phoenix but those don't count as good movies. I only skip to the fight scenes anyway.
